name: Queen Of Blades Part 1
description:
QUEEN OF BLADES PART 1

Queen, a warrior since she was a child, is forced to cross one of the most hostile territories of Navir, her deceased brother appeared to her in agonizing dreams, if that presage is real, her brother is alive, and if there is a smaller possibility of that, Queen will find it.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Queen una guerrera desde niña se ve obligada a traspasar uno de los territorios mas hostiles de Navir,su hermano fallecido se le aparecio en sueños agonizante,si ese presajio es real,su hermano esta vivo,y si hay una mas minima posibibilidad de eso,Queen lo encontrara.

the character is based on Queen faith, here is his youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9bsh96NNi1QA4gSwomG2dA

Third Person Action Adventures

CONTROLS:

W A S D Move

Mouse Look

Click Right and Left Attack

Alt Roll

Ctrl Block

Space Jump
